'''Oskar Thysell''' is a Content Manager<ref>https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/credits</ref>, Java Creators Team Lead and Producer<ref name=":0">https://www.linkedin.com/in/oskar-thysell-4ba41bba/</ref> at [[Mojang Studios]]. He is in charge of the [[Java Realms Content Creator Program]].

== About ==
Oskar manages community-made content that is published on [[Minecraft Realms]] for ''[[Java Edition]]''. This includes reviewing and publishing maps, writing monthly blog posts about new Realms content on [[minecraft.net]], bridging the communication between mapmakers and technical developers, and developing the program itself.

He joined Mojang in 2018 as a Content Coordinator for Java Realms. In March 2025 he was promoted to Producer "for the Java Creators team"<ref name=":0" />.
